narrative=Brian Flynn was reported missing from his home at 21 Rampart Avenue. He was last known to have gone on a hiking trip with his friend Joyce Whitehouse. Concern arose when the group, which was to rendezvous at a local safe house, did not make contact as agreed. Witnesses stated they saw the group heading towards a trail near the library, but subsequent search efforts there yielded no results. It's believed Brian became separated from his group while navigating the dense, forested area. Police traced him three days later; he had managed to find an alternate path leading back to Block 1 Acre Road. Fortunately, he was unharmed, though slightly disoriented.
